verses.verse: The sons <WH1121> of Judah; <WH3063> Pharez, <WH6557> Hezron, <WH2696> and Carmi, <WH3756> and Hur, <WH2354> and Shobal. <WH7732>

And Reaiah <WH7211> the son <WH1121> of Shobal <WH7732> begat <WH3205> Jahath; <WH3189> and Jahath <WH3189> begat <WH3205> Ahumai, <WH267> and Lahad. <WH3855> These <WH428> are the families <WH4940> of the Zorathites. <WH6882>
And these <WH428> were of the father <WH1> of Etam; <WH5862> Jezreel, <WH3157> and Ishma, <WH3457> and Idbash: <WH3031> and the name <WH8034> of their sister <WH269> was Hazelelponi: <WH6753>

And Penuel <WH6439> the father <WH1> of Gedor, <WH1446> and Ezer <WH5829> the father <WH1> of Hushah. <WH2364> These <WH428> are the sons <WH1121> of Hur, <WH2354> the firstborn <WH1060> of Ephratah, <WH672> the father <WH1> of Bethlehem. <WH1035>
And Ashur <WH804> the father <WH1> of Tekoa <WH8620> had <WH1961> two <WH8147> wives, <WH802> Helah <WH2458> and Naarah. <WH5292>
And Naarah <WH5292> bore <WH3205> him Ahuzam, <WH275> and Hepher, <WH2660> and Temeni, <WH8488> and Haahashtari. <WH326> These <WH428> were the sons <WH1121> of Naarah. <WH5292>
And the sons <WH1121> of Helah <WH2458> were, Zereth, <WH6889> and Jezoar, <WH3328> and Ethnan. <WH869>
And Coz <WH6976> begat <WH3205> Anub, <WH6036> and Zobebah, <WH6637> and the families <WH4940> of Aharhel <WH316> the son <WH1121> of Harum. <WH2037>

And Jabez <WH3258> was more honorable <WH3513> than his brothers: <WH251> and his mother <WH517> called <WH7121> his name <WH8034> Jabez, <WH3258> saying, <WH559> Because <WH3588> I bore <WH3205> him with sorrow. <WH6090>

And Jabez <WH3258> called <WH7121> on the God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> saying, <WH559> Oh <WH518> that you would bless <WH1288> me indeed, and enlarge <WH7235> my coast, <WH1366> and that your hand <WH3027> might be with me, and that you would keep <WH6213> me from evil, <WH7451> that it may not grieve <WH6087> me! And God <WH430> granted <WH935> him that which <WH834> he requested. <WH7592>
And Chelub <WH3620> the brother <WH251> of Shuah <WH7746> begat <WH3205> Mehir, <WH4243> which <WH1931> was the father <WH1> of Eshton. <WH850>
And Eshton <WH850> begat <WH3205> Bethrapha, <WH1051> and Paseah, <WH6454> and Tehinnah <WH8468> the father <WH1> of Irnahash. <WH5904> These <WH428> are the men <WH582> of Rechah. <WH7397>
And the sons <WH1121> of Kenaz; <WH7073> Othniel, <WH6274> and Seraiah: <WH8304> and the sons <WH1121> of Othniel; <WH6274> Hathath. <WH2867>

And Meonothai <WH4587> begat <WH3205> Ophrah: <WH6084> and Seraiah <WH8304> begat <WH3205> Joab, <WH3097> the father <WH1> of the valley <WH1516> of Charashim; <WH2798> for they were craftsmen. <WH2796>
And the sons <WH1121> of Caleb <WH3612> the son <WH1121> of Jephunneh; <WH3312> Iru, <WH5900> Elah, <WH425> and Naam: <WH5277> and the sons <WH1121> of Elah, <WH425> even Kenaz. <WH7073>
And the sons <WH1121> of Jehaleleel; <WH3094> Ziph, <WH2128> and Ziphah, <WH2129> Tiria, <WH8493> and Asareel. <WH840>

And the sons <WH1121> of Ezra <WH5830> were, Jether, <WH3500> and Mered, <WH4778> and Epher, <WH6081> and Jalon: <WH3210> and she bore <WH2029> Miriam, <WH4813> and Shammai, <WH8048> and Ishbah <WH3431> the father <WH1> of Eshtemoa. <WH851>

And his wife <WH802> Jehudijah <WH3057> bore <WH3205> Jered <WH3382> the father <WH1> of Gedor, <WH1446> and Heber <WH2268> the father <WH1> of Socho, <WH7755> and Jekuthiel <WH3354> the father <WH1> of Zanoah. <WH2182> And these <WH428> are the sons <WH1121> of Bithiah <WH1332> the daughter <WH1323> of Pharaoh, <WH6547> which <WH834> Mered <WH4778> took. <WH3947>

And the sons <WH1121> of his wife <WH802> Hodiah <WH1940> the sister <WH269> of Naham, <WH5163> the father <WH1> of Keilah <WH7084> the Garmite, <WH1636> and Eshtemoa <WH851> the Maachathite. <WH4602>

And the sons <WH1121> of Shimon <WH7889> were, Amnon, <WH550> and Rinnah, <WH7441> Benhanan, <WH1135> and Tilon. <WH8436> And the sons <WH1121> of Ishi <WH3469> were, Zoheth, <WH2105> and Benzoheth. <WH1132>

The sons <WH1121> of Shelah <WH7956> the son <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> were, Er <WH6147> the father <WH1> of Lecah, <WH3922> and Laadah <WH3935> the father <WH1> of Mareshah, <WH4762> and the families <WH4940> of the house <WH1004> of them that worked <WH5656> fine linen, <WH948> of the house <WH1004> of Ashbea, <WH791>

And Jokim, <WH3137> and the men <WH582> of Chozeba, <WH3578> and Joash, <WH3101> and Saraph, <WH8315> who <WH834> had the dominion <WH1166> in Moab, <WH4124> and Jashubilehem. <WH3433> And these are ancient <WH6267> things. <WH1697>
These <WH1992> were the potters, <WH3335> and those that dwelled <WH3427> among plants <WH5194> and hedges: <WH1448> there <WH8033> they dwelled <WH3427> with the king <WH4428> for his work. <WH4399>
The sons <WH1121> of Simeon <WH8095> were, Nemuel, <WH5241> and Jamin, <WH3226> Jarib, <WH3402> Zerah, <WH2226> and Shaul: <WH7586>
Shallum <WH7967> his son, <WH1121> Mibsam <WH4017> his son, <WH1121> Mishma <WH4927> his son. <WH1121>
And the sons <WH1121> of Mishma; <WH4927> Hamuel <WH2536> his son, <WH1121> Zacchur <WH2139> his son, <WH1121> Shimei <WH8096> his son. <WH1121>

And Shimei <WH8096> had sixteen <WH8337> <WH6240> sons <WH1121> and six <WH8337> daughters: <WH1323> but his brothers <WH251> had not many <WH7227> children, <WH1121> neither <WH3808> did all <WH3605> their family <WH4940> multiply, <WH7235> like to the children <WH1121> of Judah. <WH3063>
And they dwelled <WH3427> at Beersheba, <WH884> and Moladah, <WH4137> and Hazarshual, <WH2705>
And at Bilhah, <WH1090> and at Ezem, <WH6107> and at Tolad, <WH8434>
And at Bethuel, <WH1328> and at Hormah, <WH2767> and at Ziklag, <WH6860>
And at Bethmarcaboth, <WH1024> and Hazarsusim, <WH2702> and at Bethbirei, <WH1011> and at Shaaraim. <WH8189> These <WH428> were their cities <WH5892> to the reign <WH4427> of David. <WH1732>
And their villages <WH2691> were, Etam, <WH5862> and Ain, <WH5871> Rimmon, <WH7417> and Tochen, <WH8507> and Ashan, <WH6228> five <WH2568> cities: <WH5892>
And all <WH3605> their villages <WH2691> that were round <WH5439> about the same cities, <WH5892> to Baal. <WH1168> These <WH2063> were their habitations, <WH4186> and their genealogy. <WH3188>
And Meshobab, <WH4877> and Jamlech, <WH3230> and Joshah, <WH3144> the son <WH1121> of Amaziah, <WH558>
And Joel, <WH3100> and Jehu <WH3058> the son <WH1121> of Josibiah, <WH3143> the son <WH1121> of Seraiah, <WH8304> the son <WH1121> of Asiel, <WH6221>
And Elioenai, <WH454> and Jaakobah, <WH3291> and Jeshohaiah, <WH3439> and Asaiah, <WH6222> and Adiel, <WH5717> and Jesimiel, <WH3450> and Benaiah, <WH1141>

And Ziza <WH2124> the son <WH1121> of Shiphi, <WH8230> the son <WH1121> of Allon, <WH438> the son <WH1121> of Jedaiah, <WH3042> the son <WH1121> of Shimri, <WH8113> the son <WH1121> of Shemaiah; <WH8098>
These <WH428> mentioned <WH935> by their names <WH8034> were princes <WH5387> in their families: <WH4940> and the house <WH1004> of their fathers <WH1> increased <WH6555> greatly. <WH7230>
And they went <WH3212> to the entrance <WH3996> of Gedor, <WH1446> even to the east <WH4217> side <WH4217> of the valley, <WH1516> to seek <WH1245> pasture <WH4829> for their flocks. <WH6629>

And they found <WH4672> fat <WH8082> pasture <WH4829> and good, <WH2896> and the land <WH776> was wide, <WH7342> <WH3027> and quiet, <WH8252> and peaceable; <WH7961> for they of Ham <WH2526> had dwelled <WH3427> there <WH8033> of old. <WH6440>

And these <WH428> written <WH3789> by name <WH8034> came <WH935> in the days <WH3117> of Hezekiah <WH2396> king <WH4428> of Judah, <WH3063> and smote <WH5221> their tents, <WH168> and the habitations <WH4583> that were found <WH4672> there, <WH8033> and destroyed <WH2763> them utterly to this <WH2088> day, <WH3117> and dwelled <WH3427> in their rooms: <WH8478> because <WH3588> there was pasture <WH4829> there <WH8033> for their flocks. <WH6629>

And some of them, even of the sons <WH1121> of Simeon, <WH8095> five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967> men, <WH582> went <WH1980> to mount <WH2022> Seir, <WH8165> having for their captains <WH7218> Pelatiah, <WH6410> and Neariah, <WH5294> and Rephaiah, <WH7509> and Uzziel, <WH5816> the sons <WH1121> of Ishi. <WH3469>
And they smote <WH5221> the rest <WH7611> of the Amalekites <WH6003> that were escaped, <WH6413> and dwelled <WH3427> there <WH8033> to this <WH2088> day. <WH3117>
